content:
题目

通过 Ajax 可以根据用户的点击，显示相关内容。

参考分析思路：页面接受 Servlet 返回给 Ajax 的内容，使用 jQuery 相关代码完成。

运行效果参见下图：

代码

// EmployeeListServlet.java
package pub.zxj.ajax.practice;

import com.alibaba.fastjson.JSON;

import javax.servlet.annotation.WebServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.ArrayList;

/**
 * @author Jaime
 */
@WebServlet(name = "EmployeeListServlet",value = "/employee_list")
public class EmployeeListServlet extends HttpServlet {
    @Override
    protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws IOException {
        ArrayList<String> employeeArrayList = new ArrayList<>();
        employeeArrayList.add("小红<br>小明<br>小白");
        employeeArrayList.add("职员<br>经理");
        employeeArrayList.add("人事部<br>技术部<br>无线事业部");
        resp.setContentType("text/html;charset=UTF-8");
        resp.getWriter().println(JSON.toJSONString(employeeArrayList));
    }
}

<!-- employeeArrayList.jsp -->
<%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=UTF-8" %>
<html>

<head>
    <title>职员列表</title>
    <style type="text/css">

        * {

            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }

        #list {
            width: 522px;
            height: 30px;
            margin: 10px auto;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            line-height: 26px;
            vertical-align: middle;
        }

        #info-panel {
            width: 522px;
            height: 80px;
            margin: 10px auto;
            text-align: center;
        }

        input {
            width: 171px;
        }
    </style>
</head>

<body>
    <div id="list">
        <input name="btn" type="button" value="员工列表" />
        <input name="btn" type="button" value="职位列表" />
        <input name="btn" type="button" value="部门列表" />
    </div>
    <div id="info-panel"></div>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        let btn = document.getElementsByName("btn");
        console.log(btn);
        for (let i = 0; i < btn.length; i++) {
            // console.log(btn[i]);
            btn[i].onclick = function() {
                let xmlhttp = window.XMLHttpRequest ? new XMLHttpRequest() : new ActiveXObject("Microsoft.XMLHTTP");
                xmlhttp.open("GET", "/ajax_war_exploded/employee_list", true);
                xmlhttp.send();
                xmlhttp.onreadystatechange = function() {
                    document.getElementById("info-panel").innerHTML = "";
                    if (xmlhttp.readyState == 4 && xmlhttp.status == 200) {
                        // console.log(xmlhttp.responseText);
                        let json = JSON.parse(xmlhttp.responseText);
                        console.log(json[i]);
                        document.getElementById("info-panel").innerHTML = json[i];
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    </script>
</body>

</html>
